name: The Health Policy Partnership
goal: We are a specialist health policy consultancy. We create innovative policy initiatives and powerful evidenceâ€“based communications for organisations across the health spectrum. We provide a unique, seamless approach to help resolve the most complex issues facing our health care systems. We do this through rigorous research and expert synthesis of evidence, inter-sectoral collaboration, and powerful communications that act as the starting point for meaningful changes in policy and practice.
euInitiatives: HPP is a member of the The EU Health Policy Platform (representing the HFPN). See: https://ec.europa.eu/health/interest_groups/policy_platform_en
